title: Mommy Kink

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At the start of the game, one protective role is named as your "Mommy"
- At night, you may force your Mommy to heal you up to 3 times. This will redirect their visit from their original target to you.
- If your Mommy dies, you become an Executioner with a new random target.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause someone to die by stealing your mommy's healing from them and see town lose

desc:
Post 3354
*A mommy kink is an arousal to nurturing women, generally perceived to be in control over the subject.*
